TopicTitle: How to temporarily disable or uninstall Making History?

Articles.Content: My potato machine is struggling.  I want to disable/uninstall Making History to see if it helps

Open your GameData/SquadExpansion folder

Then move the MakingHistory folder somewhere outside GameDate (Desktop or some other place where you can find again ...)

Just tried and it didn't seem to leave any nasty side effects, unless you have crafts using parts from Making History that is.
